nodes.text: Pablo's Twi'lek partner was a female Twi'lek who helped the Rodian Pablo in his pawnshop on the planet Nal Hutta, in the capital city Bilbousa.

After the escaped prisoner Cad Bane along with Moralo Eval and Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi, disguised as bounty hunter Rako Hardeen, came into Pablo's shop and threatened him, this Twi'lek warned the local authorities which pursued the prisoners back to their starship.
